title: A Menina Que Queria Voar
overview: In the outskirts of Salvador, lives Lila, a dreamy girl who loves to create and tell stories. Between her mother's advice and ear-pulling and her brother's restlessness, Lila finds herself faced with doubt: What will she be when she grows up?! In this conflict, the little girl, who dreams of being able to fly, ventures into an enchanting fantasy and glides through the skies, as if she were made of clouds and dreams.
